sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
sections.faq:
Is it very hard to install and use?

No, It is very easy to install and use.

May I change the Buy Now text?

Yes, You can change the Buy Now text.

Can I customize the Buy Now Button?

Yes, You can customize the Buy Now Button.

Is it possible to contact with plugin author?

The Plugin admin page has enough author info to contact me.

sections.description:
WC Buy Now Button is a very useful plugin for adding a Buy Now Button in the WooCommerce Store with more functionality.

About WC Buy Now Button

WC Buy Now Button is a very useful plugin to add Buy Now Button in WooCommerce Store . WC Buy Now Button plugin has more functions with all things of add Buy Now Button text change, Color Change, Background Change, Hover Background and color change. You can choose Buy Now Button add or not add in Single product page and Shop page.
Everybody can use this plugin on their WooCommerce websites. If you want to add Buy Now button in your WooCommerce Store for checkout the product easily, you can use this plugin.
“WC Buy Now Button” is easy to use.
Note:) You need to install WooCommerce plugin before installing “WC Buy Now Button” plugin.

Docs and Support

You can find Docs here and more detailed information about WC Buy Now Button. When you cannot find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, check the support forum on WordPress.org.

WC Buy Now Button Need Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using WC Buy Now Button and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Features

  • Buy Now Button in Single Product Page option
  • Buy Now Button in Shop Page option
  • Buy Now Text change option
  • Register page customize option
  • Buy Now Button redirect to Checkout page
  • Text Color option
  • Background color option
  • Background Hover color option
  • Background Hover Background option
  • Super-fast Plugin
  • Hand Coding Plugin
  • No use of any Framework/Library
  • Light Weight Plugin
  • Author Contact info, If you face any problems.

How to use

You can use this plugin with some steps, like:

  • Search and Install the WC Buy Now Button Plugin. You will be redirected to the plugin admin page after installing it.
  • You can change the Buy Now Button text change option, Customize the Buy Now Button and more options.
  • Then you go to your WooCommerce Website and you will see the Buy Now Button in single product page and shop page besed on your choose.

NOTE:) Must be you need to install WooCommerce Plugin before install the WC Buy Now Button plugin.
